text: Say ‘I am upon a clear proof a clear statement from my Lord and you have already denied Him my Lord when you associated others with Him. I do not have that which you seek to hasten of the chastisement; the judgement in this matter and in all others is God’s alone. He decrees the judgement of truth and He is the Best of Deciders’ the Best of Judges a variant reading for yaqdī ‘He decrees’ has yaqussu that is ‘He relates the truth’.
